# Refine home page styling

## Summary
Refreshes the home page CTA styling and aligns copy comments to English for consistency across the codebase.

## Changes
- Update CTA button colors and hover state on the home page
- Adjust feature card heading color for better contrast
- Translate Home and Onboarding comments to English

## How to test
1. Start the app
2. Open the home page
3. Verify the CTA button color/hover and feature card heading styling
